item.title: About me
item.description: Hello! My name is Vasiliy Yorkin and this is my personal website. I’m interested in statically typed functional programming, type theory and formal verification. These days I spend most of my time exploring the world of FP and category theory. I’ve started to learn functional programming for real in winter 2017, when Haskell caught my interest and a couple of months later I had a chance to use it at work.
